---@class BattleRenderContext
local BattleRenderContext = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleRenderContext:initialize()
   self._entityContext = BattleRenderEntityContext:new()
end

function BattleRenderContext:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
   self._entityContext:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
end

function BattleRenderContext:update(dt)
   if self._entityContext then
      self._entityContext:update(dt)
   end
end

return BattleRenderContext
